entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon then 60 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 5 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 26 February 2023
